summary: Completed testing of dashboard layout changes. Backend working perfectly (97% success rate). Dashboard layout partially implemented - 2 cards correctly displayed and unwanted elements removed, but critical 'Kişi Ekle' button missing from header.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided

ui_bugs.issue: 'Kişi Ekle' button missing from header top right corner
ui_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Users cannot access employee management from dashboard
ui_bugs.details: User requested to move 'Kişi Ekle' button to top right corner of header, but it's completely missing from main dashboard view

integration_issues.issue: No navigation path from dashboard to employee management
integration_issues.affected_functionality: Employee CRUD operations inaccessible from main dashboard

passed_tests: Dashboard layout with 2 cards: 'Toplam Çalışan' and 'Durum Kontrolleri'
Correct removal of 'Üye Olma Tarihi' card

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (Dashboard layout mostly correct but missing critical navigation)

items: Add 'Kişi Ekle' button to dashboard header (top right corner) as requested by user
Ensure the button navigates to employee management functionality
The button should be positioned next to the 'Çıkış Yap' button in the header
Optional: Fix 403 to 401 status code for unauthenticated requests (minor backend improvement)
